message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share, but I'm open to negotiation.
I'm not afraid to negotiate, but I'm not giving away 90% of the money either. Let's find a middle ground.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need more than 400k. Let's meet in the middle.
I'm not willing to give you the majority, but I'm willing to give you a bit more than 40%.
